languages.text: "Я не мясник, и блюстители Ее Светлости могут покинуть станцию... Кроме тех, кто лично причастен к расправам над близкими людьми моих сотрудников. У меня есть обязательства перед ними".
"I'm no butcher. Her Ladyship's enforcers may leave the station... Except those personally complicit in the killing of my employees' friends and loved ones. I have a responsibility toward them."
languages.original_text: "Я не мясник, и блюстители Ее Светлости могут покинуть станцию... Кроме тех, кто лично причастен к расправам над близкими людьми моих сотрудников. У меня есть обязательства перед ними".

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “我并不是杀人狂，大人。库尔达女士的执法者可以离开这座星站……不过，有的人杀害了我手下的朋友和亲人，这些人我必须处理。我必须对我的手下负责。”
languages.original_text: "I'm no butcher. Her Ladyship's enforcers may leave the station... Except those personally complicit in the killing of my employees' friends and loved ones. I have a responsibility toward them."

traits.locale_text: “我并不是杀人狂，大人。库尔达女士的执法者可以离开这座星站……不过，有的人杀害了我手下的朋友和亲人，这些人我必须处理。我必须对我的手下负责。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「私は虐殺者ではない。女帝のエンフォーサー達はステーションから出ていくかもしれない…私の同僚の友達や、愛する者たちの殺害に直接関わっていた奴ら以外は。奴らには、果たさなければならない責任がある」
languages.original_text: "I'm no butcher. Her Ladyship's enforcers may leave the station... Except those personally complicit in the killing of my employees' friends and loved ones. I have a responsibility toward them."

traits.locale_text: 「私は虐殺者ではない。女帝のエンフォーサー達はステーションから出ていくかもしれない…私の同僚の友達や、愛する者たちの殺害に直接関わっていた奴ら以外は。奴らには、果たさなければならない責任がある」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «No soy ningún carnicero. El personal de seguridad de su señoría puede abandonar la estación... Excepto aquellos cómplices de las muertes de los amigos y seres queridos de mis trabajadores. Me debo a ellos».
languages.original_text: "I'm no butcher. Her Ladyship's enforcers may leave the station... Except those personally complicit in the killing of my employees' friends and loved ones. I have a responsibility toward them."

traits.locale_text: «No soy ningún carnicero. El personal de seguridad de su señoría puede abandonar la estación... Excepto aquellos cómplices de las muertes de los amigos y seres queridos de mis trabajadores. Me debo a ellos».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich bin kein Schlächter. Die Enforcers ihrer Ladyschaft dürfen die Station verlassen ... Abgesehen von denen, die persönlich an den Morden an den Freunden und Verwandten meiner Mitarbeiter beteiligt waren. Ich habe eine Verantwortung ihnen gegenüber."
languages.original_text: "I'm no butcher. Her Ladyship's enforcers may leave the station... Except those personally complicit in the killing of my employees' friends and loved ones. I have a responsibility toward them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin kein Schlächter. Die Enforcers ihrer Ladyschaft dürfen die Station verlassen ... Abgesehen von denen, die persönlich an den Morden an den Freunden und Verwandten meiner Mitarbeiter beteiligt waren. Ich habe eine Verantwortung ihnen gegenüber."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas un boucher. Les prévôts de Sa Seigneurie peuvent quitter la station... à part ceux qui ont pris part au meurtre des amis et des proches de mes employés. J'ai une responsabilité envers eux. »
languages.original_text: "I'm no butcher. Her Ladyship's enforcers may leave the station... Except those personally complicit in the killing of my employees' friends and loved ones. I have a responsibility toward them."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas un boucher. Les prévôts de Sa Seigneurie peuvent quitter la station... à part ceux qui ont pris part au meurtre des amis et des proches de mes employés. J'ai une responsabilité envers eux. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ben kasap değilim. Leydi Hazretleri'nin infazcıları istasyondan ayrılabilir. Çalışanlarımın dostlarını ve sevdiklerini öldürmek konusunda bizzat rol almış olanlar hariç. Onlara karşı bir sorumluluğum var."
languages.original_text: "I'm no butcher. Her Ladyship's enforcers may leave the station... Except those personally complicit in the killing of my employees' friends and loved ones. I have a responsibility toward them."

traits.locale_text: "Ben bir kasap değilim. Leydi Hazretleri'nin infazcıları istasyondan ayrılabilir. Çalışanlarımın dostlarını ve sevdiklerini öldürmek konusunda bizzat rol almış olanlar haricinde. Onlara karşı bir sorumluluğum var."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
